driver.title: GOFRTS DRIVER AGREEMENT (GLOBAL) ‚Äì USA, CANADA & MEXICO
driver.content:
THIS AGREEMENT IS INTENDED FOR IN-APP ELECTRONIC ACCEPTANCE (CLICK-WRAP).

1. PARTIES; DEFINITIONS

This GOFRTS User Agreement ("Agreement") is entered into between GOFRTS (the "Company", "GOFRTS", "we", "us") and the user selecting the role of Driver ("User", "you"). "Platform" means the GOFRTS mobile and web applications, APIs, dashboards, and related services. "Third Parties" include shippers, brokers, carriers, drivers, factoring companies, insurers, and any other platform users.

2. PLATFORM-ONLY ROLE; NO REGULATED STATUS

GOFRTS provides technology, data management, and communication tools only. GOFRTS does not provide transportation, brokerage, freight forwarding, customs brokerage, warehousing, dispatch, safety management, medical, or insurance services. GOFRTS is not a motor carrier, freight broker, freight forwarder, NVOCC, customs broker, employer, joint employer, agent, or insurer in any jurisdiction.

3. ROLE-SPECIFIC SCOPE

You use the Platform to receive trip information and communicate with carriers/brokers/shippers. You are not an employee of GOFRTS; you remain responsible for lawful operation, safety, and compliance with carrier instructions and applicable laws.

4. UPFRONT FEES; NON-REFUNDABLE; NO CHARGEBACKS

GOFRTS fees are for Platform access and services only and are due upfront. Fees are non-refundable and not contingent upon shipment completion, cargo condition, performance by any third party, or receipt of payment by any party. Chargebacks, payment reversals, and unauthorized disputes are prohibited. GOFRTS may suspend/terminate accounts for non-payment or disputes and may pursue recovery of fees, collection costs, and attorneys' fees where permitted.

5. NO PAYMENT GUARANTEE; NO ESCROW

GOFRTS does not guarantee freight charges, cargo payments, broker-to-carrier payments, shipper-to-broker payments, or driver compensation. GOFRTS is not an escrow, trustee, factoring company, or payment guarantor. Any payment arrangement between users is solely between those users.

6. NO CARGO LIABILITY; NO ACCIDENT OR MEDICAL LIABILITY

To the maximum extent permitted by law, GOFRTS assumes zero responsibility for: (a) cargo loss, damage, delay, theft, spoilage, misdelivery, or shortage; (b) accidents, collisions, incidents, property damage; (c) injuries, death, disability; (d) medical, hospital, emergency, rehabilitation, or related costs; (e) regulatory fines/penalties; (f) customs seizures, border delays, or immigration issues. You waive and release GOFRTS from all claims relating to the foregoing.

7. USER VERIFICATION; COMPLIANCE; CROSS-BORDER RESPONSIBILITY

You are solely responsible for verifying other users (authority, licenses, insurance, identity, compliance history) and for your own compliance with all applicable laws and regulations in the United States, Canada, and Mexico, including but not limited to FMCSA/DOT rules, provincial/state transportation rules, customs/import/export laws, hazardous materials rules, tax/VAT/GST, labor, immigration/visa requirements, and safety standards. GOFRTS does not independently verify user-submitted information unless expressly agreed in writing.

8. DATA STORAGE; ACCESS; DISCLOSURE; INTERNATIONAL TRANSFER

GOFRTS stores and processes operational and personal data to provide the Platform. Data may be stored or processed in the United States or other jurisdictions. GOFRTS will provide user-specific data to you upon reasonable written request, subject to identity verification and legal limitations. GOFRTS may disclose data when required by law, subpoena, court order, or lawful governmental request, or to protect the Platform, users, or public safety.

9. THIRD-PARTY SERVICES (PAYMENT PROCESSORS, MAPS, TELEMATICS)

The Platform may integrate third-party services (e.g., payment processors such as Stripe, mapping, telematics, identity tools). GOFRTS does not control third-party services and is not liable for their availability, decisions, errors, or security practices.

10. ADMINISTRATIVE RIGHTS; SUSPENSION; REMOVAL

GOFRTS may suspend, restrict, or terminate any account at any time, with or without notice, for non-payment, false or misleading information, misuse, fraud, safety concerns, legal or reputational risk, or to comply with law. GOFRTS is not liable for any losses resulting from suspension or termination.

11. LICENSE; INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY

GOFRTS grants you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable license to use the Platform for your internal business use consistent with this Agreement. GOFRTS retains all rights, title, and interest in the Platform and related IP.

12. DISCLAIMERS

THE PLATFORM IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE". GOFRTS DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, ACCURACY, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT. GOFRTS DOES NOT WARRANT THAT THE PLATFORM WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR-FREE.

13. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY

TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, GOFRTS SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES OR LOST PROFITS/REVENUE. GOFRTS' TOTAL LIABILITY FOR ANY CLAIM SHALL NOT EXCEED THE FEES PAID BY YOU TO GOFRTS IN THE PRECEDING THIRTY (30) DAYS.

14. INDEMNIFICATION

You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless GOFRTS, its owners, officers, directors, employees, contractors, and affiliates from and against any and all claims, damages, losses, liabilities, penalties, fines, costs, and expenses (including reasonable attorneys' fees) arising out of or related to: (a) your use of the Platform; (b) your shipments/loads/operations; (c) your violation of law; (d) disputes between you and any third party; (e) accidents, injuries, cargo claims, payment disputes, or customs issues attributable to you or your counterparties.

15. DISPUTE RESOLUTION; ARBITRATION; CLASS ACTION WAIVER

Any dispute arising out of or relating to this Agreement or the Platform shall be resolved by binding arbitration on an individual basis, except where prohibited by law. You waive any right to participate in a class or representative action. The arbitration will be administered in California unless otherwise required by mandatory law.

16. GOVERNING LAW

This Agreement is governed by the laws of the State of California, USA, without regard to conflict-of-law principles, except where mandatory consumer or labor protections apply and cannot be waived.

17. ELECTRONIC SIGNATURE; APP ACCEPTANCE

By clicking "I Agree" (or equivalent) in the GOFRTS application, you electronically sign and accept this Agreement. You agree that electronic acceptance is legally binding and enforceable in the United States, Canada, and Mexico.

18. ENTIRE AGREEMENT; UPDATES

This Agreement, together with GOFRTS Global Terms, Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, and any incorporated policies, constitutes the entire agreement. GOFRTS may update terms from time to time by posting updated versions in the app; continued use constitutes acceptance.

DRIVER MULTI-LANGUAGE IN-APP CONSENT

ENGLISH

By clicking 'I AGREE', I confirm that I have read, understood, and agree to the GOFRTS Global Terms, Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, and the Driver Agreement. I understand that GOFRTS is a technology platform only and assumes no responsibility for cargo, payments, accidents, injuries, death, or medical expenses.

ESPA√ëOL (SPANISH)

Al hacer clic en 'ACEPTO', confirmo que he le√≠do, comprendido y acepto los T√©rminos Globales de GOFRTS, los T√©rminos de Servicio, la Pol√≠tica de Privacidad y el Acuerdo de Driver. Entiendo que GOFRTS es √∫nicamente una plataforma tecnol√≥gica y no asume responsabilidad alguna por carga, pagos, accidentes, lesiones, fallecimiento o gastos m√©dicos.

FRAN√áAIS (FRENCH)

En cliquant sur ¬´ J'ACCEPTE ¬ª, je confirme avoir lu, compris et accept√© les Conditions Globales de GOFRTS, les Conditions d'Utilisation, la Politique de Confidentialit√© et l'Accord Driver. Je comprends que GOFRTS est uniquement une plateforme technologique et n'assume aucune responsabilit√© concernant le fret, les paiements, les accidents, les blessures, le d√©c√®s ou les frais m√©dicaux.

Electronic acceptance constitutes a legally binding agreement enforceable in the United States, Canada, and Mexico.

broker.title: GOFRTS BROKER AGREEMENT (GLOBAL) ‚Äì USA, CANADA & MEXICO
broker.content:

To the maximum extent permitted by law, GOFRTS assumes zero responsibility for: (a) cargo loss, damage, delay, theft, spoilage, misdelivery, or shortage; (b) accidents, collisions, incidents, property damage; (c) injuries, death, disability; (d) medical, hospital, emergency, rehabilitation, or related costs; (e) regulatory fines/penalties; (f) customs seizures, border delays, or immigration issues. GOFRTS may disclose data when required by law, subpoena, court order, or lawful governmental request, or to protect the Platform, users, or public safety.

9. THIRD-PARTY SERVICES (PAYMENT PROCESSORS, MAPS, TELEMATICS)

The Platform may integrate third-party services (e.g., payment processors such as Stripe, mapping, telematics, identity tools). GOFRTS does not control third-party services and is not liable for their availability, decisions, errors, or security practices.

14. INDEMNIFICATION

You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless GOFRTS, its owners, officers, directors, employees, contractors, and affiliates from and against any and all claims, damages, losses, liabilities, penalties, fines, costs, and expenses (including reasonable attorneys' fees) arising out of or related to: (a) your use of the Platform; (b) your shipments/loads/operations; (c) your violation of law; (d) disputes between you and any third party; (e) accidents, injuries, cargo claims, payment disputes, or customs issues attributable to you or your counterparties.

15. DISPUTE RESOLUTION; ARBITRATION; CLASS ACTION WAIVER

Any dispute arising out of or relating to this Agreement or the Platform shall be resolved by binding arbitration on an individual basis, except where prohibited by law. You waive any right to participate in a class or representative action. The arbitration will be administered in California unless otherwise required by mandatory law.

16. GOVERNING LAW

This Agreement is governed by the laws of the State of California, USA, without regard to conflict-of-law principles, except where mandatory consumer or labor protections apply and cannot be waived.

17. ELECTRONIC SIGNATURE; APP ACCEPTANCE

By clicking "I Agree" (or equivalent) in the GOFRTS application, you electronically sign and accept this Agreement. You agree that electronic acceptance is legally binding and enforceable in the United States, Canada, and Mexico.

18. ENTIRE AGREEMENT; UPDATES

This Agreement, together with GOFRTS Global Terms, Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, and any incorporated policies, constitutes the entire agreement. GOFRTS may update terms from time to time by posting updated versions in the app; continued use constitutes acceptance.

CARRIER MULTI-LANGUAGE IN-APP CONSENT

ENGLISH

By clicking 'I AGREE', I confirm that I have read, understood, and agree to the GOFRTS Global Terms, Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, and the Carrier Agreement. I understand that GOFRTS is a technology platform only and assumes no responsibility for cargo, payments, accidents, injuries, death, or medical expenses.

Entiendo que GOFRTS es √∫nicamente una plataforma tecnol√≥gica y no asume responsabilidad alguna por carga, pagos, accidentes, lesiones, fallecimiento o gastos m√©dicos.

FRAN√áAIS (FRENCH)

shipper.title: GOFRTS SHIPPER AGREEMENT (GLOBAL) ‚Äì USA, CANADA & MEXICO
shipper.content:
THIS AGREEMENT IS INTENDED FOR IN-APP ELECTRONIC ACCEPTANCE (CLICK-WRAP).

1. PARTIES; DEFINITIONS

This GOFRTS User Agreement ("Agreement") is entered into between GOFRTS (the "Company", "GOFRTS", "we", "us") and the user selecting the role of Shipper ("User", "you"). "Platform" means the GOFRTS mobile and web applications, APIs, dashboards, and related services. "Third Parties" include shippers, brokers, carriers, drivers, factoring companies, insurers, and any other platform users.

2. PLATFORM-ONLY ROLE; NO REGULATED STATUS

GOFRTS provides technology, data management, and communication tools only. GOFRTS does not provide transportation, brokerage, freight forwarding, customs brokerage, warehousing, dispatch, safety management, medical, or insurance services. GOFRTS is not a motor carrier, freight broker, freight forwarder, NVOCC, customs broker, employer, joint employer, agent, or insurer in any jurisdiction.

3. ROLE-SPECIFIC SCOPE

You use the Platform to post or request transportation capacity and to communicate with brokers/carriers/drivers. You remain responsible for your freight, classification, packaging, loading, securement, sealing, and all shipment instructions.

4. UPFRONT FEES; NON-REFUNDABLE; NO CHARGEBACKS

GOFRTS fees are for Platform access and services only and are due upfront. Fees are non-refundable and not contingent upon shipment completion, cargo condition, performance by any third party, or receipt of payment by any party. Chargebacks, payment reversals, and unauthorized disputes are prohibited. GOFRTS may suspend/terminate accounts for non-payment or disputes and may pursue recovery of fees, collection costs, and attorneys' fees where permitted.

5. NO PAYMENT GUARANTEE; NO ESCROW

GOFRTS does not guarantee freight charges, cargo payments, broker-to-carrier payments, shipper-to-broker payments, or driver compensation. GOFRTS is not an escrow, trustee, factoring company, or payment guarantor. Any payment arrangement between users is solely between those users.

6. NO CARGO LIABILITY; NO ACCIDENT OR MEDICAL LIABILITY

To the maximum extent permitted by law, GOFRTS assumes zero responsibility for: (a) cargo loss, damage, delay, theft, spoilage, misdelivery, or shortage; (b) accidents, collisions, incidents, property damage; (c) injuries, death, disability; (d) medical, hospital, emergency, rehabilitation, or related costs; (e) regulatory fines/penalties; (f) customs seizures, border delays, or immigration issues. You waive and release GOFRTS from all claims relating to the foregoing.

7. USER VERIFICATION; COMPLIANCE; CROSS-BORDER RESPONSIBILITY

You are solely responsible for verifying other users (authority, licenses, insurance, identity, compliance history) and for your own compliance with all applicable laws and regulations in the United States, Canada, and Mexico, including but not limited to FMCSA/DOT rules, provincial/state transportation rules, customs/import/export laws, hazardous materials rules, tax/VAT/GST, labor, immigration/visa requirements, and safety standards. GOFRTS does not independently verify user-submitted information unless expressly agreed in writing.

8. DATA STORAGE; ACCESS; DISCLOSURE; INTERNATIONAL TRANSFER

GOFRTS stores and processes operational and personal data to provide the Platform. Data may be stored or processed in the United States or other jurisdictions. GOFRTS will provide user-specific data to you upon reasonable written request, subject to identity verification and legal limitations. GOFRTS may disclose data when required by law, subpoena, court order, or lawful governmental request, or to protect the Platform, users, or public safety.

9. THIRD-PARTY SERVICES (PAYMENT PROCESSORS, MAPS, TELEMATICS)

The Platform may integrate third-party services (e.g., payment processors such as Stripe, mapping, telematics, identity tools). GOFRTS does not control third-party services and is not liable for their availability, decisions, errors, or security practices.

10. ADMINISTRATIVE RIGHTS; SUSPENSION; REMOVAL

GOFRTS may suspend, restrict, or terminate any account at any time, with or without notice, for non-payment, false or misleading information, misuse, fraud, safety concerns, legal or reputational risk, or to comply with law. GOFRTS is not liable for any losses resulting from suspension or termination.

11. LICENSE; INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY

GOFRTS grants you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable license to use the Platform for your internal business use consistent with this Agreement. GOFRTS retains all rights, title, and interest in the Platform and related IP.

12. DISCLAIMERS

THE PLATFORM IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE". GOFRTS DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, ACCURACY, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT. GOFRTS DOES NOT WARRANT THAT THE PLATFORM WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR-FREE.

13. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY

TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, GOFRTS SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES OR LOST PROFITS/REVENUE. GOFRTS' TOTAL LIABILITY FOR ANY CLAIM SHALL NOT EXCEED THE FEES PAID BY YOU TO GOFRTS IN THE PRECEDING THIRTY (30) DAYS.

14. INDEMNIFICATION

You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless GOFRTS, its owners, officers, directors, employees, contractors, and affiliates from and against any and all claims, damages, losses, liabilities, penalties, fines, costs, and expenses (including reasonable attorneys' fees) arising out of or related to: (a) your use of the Platform; (b) your shipments/loads/operations; (c) your violation of law; (d) disputes between you and any third party; (e) accidents, injuries, cargo claims, payment disputes, or customs issues attributable to you or your counterparties.

15. DISPUTE RESOLUTION; ARBITRATION; CLASS ACTION WAIVER

Any dispute arising out of or relating to this Agreement or the Platform shall be resolved by binding arbitration on an individual basis, except where prohibited by law. You waive any right to participate in a class or representative action. The arbitration will be administered in California unless otherwise required by mandatory law.

16. GOVERNING LAW

This Agreement is governed by the laws of the State of California, USA, without regard to conflict-of-law principles, except where mandatory consumer or labor protections apply and cannot be waived.

17. ELECTRONIC SIGNATURE; APP ACCEPTANCE

By clicking "I Agree" (or equivalent) in the GOFRTS application, you electronically sign and accept this Agreement. You agree that electronic acceptance is legally binding and enforceable in the United States, Canada, and Mexico.

18. ENTIRE AGREEMENT; UPDATES

This Agreement, together with GOFRTS Global Terms, Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, and any incorporated policies, constitutes the entire agreement. GOFRTS may update terms from time to time by posting updated versions in the app; continued use constitutes acceptance.

SHIPPER MULTI-LANGUAGE IN-APP CONSENT

ENGLISH

By clicking 'I AGREE', I confirm that I have read, understood, and agree to the GOFRTS Global Terms, Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, and the Shipper Agreement. I understand that GOFRTS is a technology platform only and assumes no responsibility for cargo, payments, accidents, injuries, death, or medical expenses.

Entiendo que GOFRTS es √∫nicamente una plataforma tecnol√≥gica y no asume responsabilidad alguna por carga, pagos, accidentes, lesiones, fallecimiento o gastos m√©dicos.

FRAN√áAIS (FRENCH)

En cliquant sur ¬´ J'ACCEPTE ¬ª, je confirme avoir lu, compris et accept√© les Conditions Globales de GOFRTS, les Conditions d'Utilisation, la Politique de Confidentialit√© et l'Accord Shipper. Je comprends que GOFRTS est uniquement une plateforme technologique et n'assume aucune responsabilit√© concernant le fret, les paiements, les accidents, les blessures, le d√©c√®s ou les frais m√©dicaux.
